main event: A UFO sighting was reported on October 29, 1959, involving a circular or oval object that glowed and was estimated to be traveling at high speeds.
interesting points: The object was described as being 1 1/2 to 2 feet in diameter and glowing red or orange in color., The estimated speed of the object was approximately 500 mph., There was no radar contact or reported air traffic in the area., The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes., Conclusion varied from balloon to possible astronomical phenomena due to insufficient data.
sighted object: circular or oval, glowing red or orange object
witness description: Warren G. Marvel, S/Sgt, 825th ACWRON, Comm Center Specialist, F-6
